actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Public Works.

official_title: A bill to amend the act of April 9, 1966, to provide for the acquisition of an existing structure to be used as the official residence of the Vice President of the United States.

summary.text: Authorizes an appropriation to the General Services Administration in the amount of $1,500,000 for the acquisition, initial repair and improvement, and furnishing of an official residence in the District of Columbia for Vice Presidents.

titles.title: A bill to amend the act of April 9, 1966, to provide for the acquisition of an existing structure to be used as the official residence of the Vice President of the United States.
